bibl.title: University of Delaware Archaeological Project at 'Abu Sha'ar: The 1992 Season.
bibl.note: The excavations in 1992 concentrated on the fort and continued clearing portions of hydraulic installations. The north gate and arch over it were covered with graffiti and Christian crosses. Presentation of 2 ecclesiastical inscriptions in Greek.
bibl.seg: SIDEBOTHAM Steven E., University of Delaware Archaeological Project at 'Abu Sha'ar: The 1992 Season.

The excavations in 1992 concentrated on the fort and continued clearing portions of hydraulic installations. The north gate and arch over it were covered with graffiti and Christian crosses. Presentation of 2 ecclesiastical inscriptions in Greek.
